objects.text:
• Patented SmartGRID Technology
• Adjustable Lumbar Support
• Ergonomic High Back Design
Limited time offer! Two for the price of one!

product_details.name: The Sleep Company Onyx Orthopedic Office Chair | Patented SmartGRID Technology | Adjustable Lumbar Support for Ergonomic Sitting Posture | High Back Office Chair for Work, Home, Study | Black
product_details.description: Brand: The Sleep Company. Colour: Black. Material: SmartGRID. Product Dimensions: 48D x 62W x 117H Centimeters. Size: High Back. Back Style: Solid Back. Special Feature: Adjustable Lumbar, Adjustable Height, Adjustable Arm Rest, Rolling, Adjustable Headrest, Adjustable Height, Ergonomic, Adjustable Tilt Control. Product Care Instructions: Wipe Clean. Net Quantity: 1.00 count. Seat Material Type: SmartGRID. Recommended Uses For Product: Office. Pattern: Black. Finish Type: Chrome Finish. Room Type: Living Room, Office, Meeting Room. Age Range (Description): Adult. Shape: Ergonomic. Model Name: SmartGRID Onyx Black. Arm Style: With Arm Rest. Surface Recommendation: Hard Floor. Seat Back Interior Height: 31 Inches. Furniture Finish: Black. Seat Height: 23 Inches. Seat Depth: 48.3 Centimeters. Fill Material: Patented SmartGRID. Seat Length: 25 Inches. Form Factor: Medium Firm. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 22 kg. Generic Name: Adjustable.

banner_details:
This banner is split into two contrasting vertical halves: a dark left side with promotional text and a light right side with a product image. The layout is minimalistic yet bold. 

On the left half, "heading" text introduces the main message in large, uppercase white font. Just below, the "tagline" text provides a striking promotional offer in vibrant blue. The "description" text follows with three product benefits using compact bullet points. The "price" and "subheading" layers deliver the cost and additional offer details. At the bottom, a call-to-action button composed of "cta_background" and "cta" text in white urges immediate purchase.

A large ergonomic chair image ("product_image") is positioned on the right half of the banner. It overlays a light grey background, balancing the dark-rich left with visual clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: `#1A1A1A` (background and text area)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (text and background)
- Blue: `#0095FF` (accents, highlights, dividers, buttons)
- Light Grey: `#F5F5F5` (product background)
product_color: The product image showcases a modern ergonomic office chair with a sleek color palette dominated by matte black and accentuated with vibrant blue tones. The primary color is a deep matte black (#1A1A1A), providing a professional and minimalist base. The bright blue (#1E90FF) honeycomb cushioning on the backrest and seat adds contrast and visual intrigue, highlighted further by subtle light blue accents (#87CEFA) creating depth. The blue areas blend organically with the black without overpowering it, maintaining balance. The palette for a banner could use #1A1A1A (Black), #1E90FF (Vibrant Blue), #87CEFA (Light Blue), and #333333 (Dark Gray) for consistency and impact.
